name: electron-sveltekit-clusterfuck
description: A Clusterfuck of mixing Electron & SvelteKit

scripts.build: cd svelte && pnpm build && rimraf ../electron/src/app && node ../recursive-copy build ../electron/src/app && cd ../electron && pnpm make
scripts.install: cd svelte && pnpm i && cd ../electron && pnpm i
scripts.upgrade-deps: pnpm upgrade && cd svelte && pnpm upgrade && cd ../electron && pnpm upgrade
scripts.upgrade-deps:l: pnpm upgrade -L && cd svelte && pnpm upgrade -L && cd ../electron && pnpm upgrade -L

author: Expo
